member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.VisualStudio.Internal.Actions.StdAfxAction.Execute(JetBrains.Application.DataContext.IDataContext,JetBrains.ActionManagement.DelegateExecute)
member.summary: Executes action. Called after Update, that set ActionPresentation.Enabled to true.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.VisualStudio.Internal.Actions.StdAfxAction.Update(JetBrains.Application.DataContext.IDataContext,JetBrains.ActionManagement.ActionPresentation,JetBrains.ActionManagement.DelegateUpdate)
member.summary: Updates action visual presentation. If presentation.Enabled is set to false, ExecuteAsync will not be called.
